name: ConnectSense
0:
”Alexa, turn on smart outlet 1”
”Alexa, turn off smart outlet 1”
”Alexa, turn on smart outlet 2”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: With the ConnectSense skill and Alexa, you can interact with your ConnectSense In-Wall Outlet or Smart Outlet² to turn on and off plug-in devices. To get started, select the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa App to link your ConnectSense account. Then, follow the onscreen prompts or say, “Alexa, discover devices.” The ConnectSense skill functionality is only available with the ConnectSense In-Wall outlet and Smart Outlet².
